example.eg: You'll need to fill out this form to apply for your licence.
example.egtrans: 你需要填好这张表才能申请执照。

example.eg: The chairs looked the same in form and colour.
example.egtrans: 这些椅子外形和颜色都一模一样。

example.eg: He could make out her form behind the curtain.
example.egtrans: 他能辨认出她在窗帘后的身影。

example.eg: Ice is water in frozen form.
example.egtrans: 冰是水冻结时的形态。

example.eg: Imitation is a form of flattery.
example.egtrans: 模仿是奉承的一种形式。

example.eg: What form will the training take?
example.egtrans: 培训会以什么形式进行？

example.eg: He formed a ladder out of bits of old wood.
example.egtrans: 他用一些旧木料造了一架梯子。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 建造, 制造, 塑造, 构造

example.eg: You form the plural by adding an "s."
example.egtrans: 往名词后面加“s”，就能构成复数。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 建造, 构成, 构造

example.eg: Form a ball out of clay, then flatten it with the palm of your hand.
example.egtrans: 用黏土塑造一颗球，然后再用手掌压平它。

example.eg: After underwater earthquakes, mountains formed.
example.egtrans: 水底地震后，形成了山。

example.eg: She was an eccentric and didn't want to adhere to the forms of her culture.
example.egtrans: 她是个怪人，不想遵守文化惯例。

example.eg: The artist did not care about colour, only about form.
example.egtrans: 那名艺术家不关心颜色，只在乎构形。

example.eg: She has such a beautiful form.
example.egtrans: 她身材很棒。

example.eg: She put the dress on a form to check its proportions.
example.egtrans: 她把衣服穿在人体模型身上看比例如何。

example.eg: I like the form of this poem, but it has no substance.
example.egtrans: 这首诗的表现形式我很喜欢，但内容空洞无物。

example.eg: Next, pour the plaster into a form and let it set.
example.egtrans: 接下来，将石膏倒入磨具，让其凝固。

example.eg: This sweater will lose its form if it gets wet.
example.egtrans: 这件毛衣要打湿就没型了。

example.eg: He only did it for the sake of form.
example.egtrans: 他这不过是面子上的功夫。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 形式, 形式主义, 面子

example.eg: There is a form to follow on such occasions.
example.egtrans: 这种场合需要遵循一定的程序。

example.eg: It's bad form to back out at the last minute.
example.egtrans: 在最后一刻退出是一种不好的行为。

example.eg: This pianist is a master of form.
example.egtrans: 那位钢琴家在表现技巧方面是一位大师。

example.eg: He's in good form for the match.
example.egtrans: 他的比赛状态很好。

example.eg: I like to write in a colloquial form.
example.egtrans: 写作时我喜欢采用口语风格。

example.eg: Forms are constructed into which concrete is poured.
example.egtrans: 浇注水泥的模子已经做好了。

example.eg: I'll be starting the sixth form in September.
example.egtrans: 九月我就要开始上六年级了。

example.eg: He set the form in the printing press.
example.egtrans: 他将印版装到印刷机上。

example.eg: A rainbow formed above their heads.
example.egtrans: 一道彩虹出现在他们头顶上空。

example.eg: They discussed it, and the plan formed.
example.egtrans: 他们讨论后，计划成形。

example.eg: They formed a union.
Sugar forms one of the main ingredients of soft drinks.
She formed the opinion that he was a liar.
He formed many friendships during those years.
She formed the clay into the shape of a bird.
example.egtrans: 她把粘土捏成一只鸟的形状。

example.eg: She was formed in one of the best schools.
All you need is a completed application form and a photo ID to get a library card.
example.egtrans: 你只需要一张填好的申请表以及一张带照片的身份证就能获得一张图书馆卡了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 申请表, 求职申请表

example.eg: Ice sculptures are a modern art form.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 典型形式, 正规形式

example.eg: You have to sign a consent form before having any type of surgery.  I signed a consent form to allow the doctors to harvest my organs if I died during the operation.
example.egtrans: 在进行任何手术之前，你都要签同意书。我签了一份同意书，同意如果我在手术中身亡，医生可以移植我的器官。

example.eg: Different types of music call for different dance forms.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 报名表格, 参赛申请表

example.eg: Our solar system forms part of a galaxy we call the Milky Way.
I don't think I have enough information to form an opinion yet.
That stone in the middle of the river forms eddies downstream.
Word-processing software is useful for producing form letters.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 正式信函，公文，公函, （投递给多人的）印刷函件

example.eg: In England, the correct form of address for a duke is "your Grace".
If you have a problem, you should speak to your form tutor.
Free form is a type of jazz introduced in the 1950s.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 即兴的, 无计划的, 形式自由的

example.eg: The horse is in good form for the race.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 健壮的体魄, 良好的健康状况

example.eg: It is good form to offer your seat to a lady.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 举止有礼, 有礼貌的行为

example.eg: Many aspects of the human form clearly show the close relationship of our species with the great apes.
The door opened and a human form stood silhouetted against the light.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 人类外形, 人的外形
正式地, 按规定地, 照例地

example.eg: Even though I'm 50 years old, I'm still in fine form and can beat you at tennis any day!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 健康状况良好, 身体状态良好

example.eg: I go to the gym every week to keep in good form.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 状态很好，处于良好状态

dsense.name: in good form, on good form

example.eg: He's in good form tonight because he just found out he got a promotion.
Her reply came in the form of a smile.
example.egtrans: 她以微笑的形式作答了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以 ... 的形式, 就像…

example.eg: I'll need to fill out an order form for more printer cartridges.
She must be in really poor form today; she's limping and she looks pale.
It's really poor form to put your feet on the coffee table.
Joey has promised to reform, but I'm not hopeful.
example.egtrans: 乔伊承诺说会改正，但我不抱什么希望。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 改正, 改过自新, 悔改

example.eg: Parents must sign a release form before their children's work can be displayed.

dsense.name: sixth form
dsense.guideword: UK, regional (secondary school: final 2 years) (英国)

example.eg: The sculpture began to take form only minutes after the artist began working.
Jennifer was true to form in being late for school.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与往常一样, 一如既往

example.eg: True to form, he won't tell me where he was last night.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与往常一样, 一如既往

example.eg: The waveform of a current refers to its shape on a graph of signal strength plotted against time.
